channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Construction rubbish being dumped on our street, 1st October
item.description:
We believe that some of our neighbours don't know they need to leave rubbish on the main street. This leads to bags waste not being picked up for days/weeks and leads to other rubbish like construction waste being left there that blocks the street

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Kingsland Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Household waste dumped, 1st October
item.description:
I reported this last week and the report was closed as apparently the rubbish could not be found - it is still there this morning - I have hopefully shown a picture of What3Words 'chef.cabin.medium' and marked it on the map - it is a pathway that runs along the A21 and just past the Turpington Lane junction - the bags are all in amongst the trees

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): A21, Bromley Common, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Streetlight ‘021’ is out in Lee Road, opposite Coppelia Road Streetlight ‘021’ is out in Lee Road, opposite Coppelia Road., 1st October
item.description:

item.category: Pavement Defect (uneven surface / cracked paving slab)

item.title: Sewer drains x2 often smells from park to front of parkhaus where huge drain is. Landlords send people out who just close manhole covers and don’t do anything… extra issue ignored by landlords then bins stink every wed at front of development. Please collect at back not in front of public park and high footfall retail area. It stinks. I can’t even sit inside the shop most of the time 10-20 mins max. Often ignored issue as they don’t want to spend money but affecting opening of business for 5/6 months I just want to be able to open the door, 1st October
item.description:
Have contacted landlords several times with regards to big sewer drain with stagnant yellow water in may be connected to stinky drains out front. Frequent sewage smells haven’t been able to open shop doors or windows for months stops me trading +20x bins
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Maple Path, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tree affecting light to property, 1st October
